dataList.dlg: Hippity-hop… Out on a bop… The rabbit hops in. To smash it to bits!
What? Never seen a hare up early to wash his face before?
Got any good missions for me? The kind that gets the blood pumping and eyes fierce… One of those exciting ones.
I may not look it, but I’m a nocturnal creature—means the dark spurs me further.
Oi there! If you’ve got time for silly chinwags, send me on a mission instead.
I’m a rabbit. I go anywhere with grass to graze.
Who says rabbits’re weak? Ever seen what happens when you try to fight a horde of starving coneys?
Don’t get too bitter if I wallop you while I’m fightin’, mate. It’s in the rabbit’s nature.
That clock of yours seems pretty useful, so why don’tcha join the Rabbit Team and hop with me?
Did you know? A rabbit’s got good ears, too.
Alright, now that’s what I like to see!
Right, time to graze some grass.
I spy with my eyes a fresh patch of grass!
Got some sort of bombastic plan?
Hop on!
Go on and get wild for me!
Hah…!
Huff, that feels good to chew.
Kicked it already? Were you getting lonely or what.
Easy as salad.
I was following the orders. You can say your complaints to the high heid yins.
How’s that? Remarkably strong and unbelievably fast, eh?
My muscles are quivering with excitement. Got anyone else to scuffle? I’m just getting started!
No time for rest. We’re going right back in!
